citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 130pm on
21-Jun-17.
I talked to the licensee on the phone and she stated that they were out of town.

narrative:
